id.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of this assessment question

type.description: The type of this object - always `assessment_questions`

assessment_answer_category.description: Category is the section in the Create Move form that an assessment question appears in, e.g. Health or Risks

nomis_alert_type.description: The NOMIS alert type for this assessment question

nomis_alert_code.description: The NOMIS alert code for this assessment question

key.description: Machine readable unique key string attribute for this assessment question

title.description: The label displayed on the Create Move form for this assessment question

disabled_at.description: The date-time at which a value was disabled, in ISO-8601 format, or null if it is enabled
